item.title: KO
item.description: score:9 Chances: Money is shifting toward The Trade Desk’s space at an eye-popping pace. This company has made moves to exponentially increase its profits in recent years. Some stocks are too good to sell. A few of these Dogs of the Dow can probably hunt in the new year.

item.title: PR
item.description: score:139 Chances: Permian Resources Corp. is engaging in an underwritten public offering, indicating a potential increase in capital and growth opportunities. The company’s consistent focus on responsible acquisition and development of crude oil suggests a sustainable approach to driving returns. The declaration of quarterly cash dividends reflects a commitment to delivering value to shareholders.
